name: ocbs-full-stack
description: Online Cinema Booking System - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: cd ocbs-frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ocbs-backend && npm run dev" "cd ocbs-frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd ocbs-backend && npm install && cd ../ocbs-frontend && npm install

author: Joydeep Paul
